actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to direct the Interstate Commerce Commission to issue regulations prohibiting the use by any private organization transporting certain animals in interstate commerce of arrangement and procedures providing for collection of animal transportation costs on delivery of the animals, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Interstate Commerce Commission to issue regulations prohibiting the transporting of any dog, cat, monkey, rabbit, or bird in interstate commerce when the cost of such transporting is paid and collected on delivery. Imposes criminal penalties of up to a $1,000 fine and/or one year in jail for violations of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Interstate Commerce Commission to issue regulations prohibiting the use by any private organization transporting certain animals in interstate commerce of arrangement and procedures providing for collection of animal transportation costs on delivery of the animals, and for other purposes.
